truth: -  "The Higgs boson, also known as the 'God particle', is a fundamental particle that gives other particles their mass."
fiction: -  "The Higgs boson, also known as the 'God particle', is a fundamental particle that gives other particles their color."

truth: -  "Quarks are elementary particles and a fundamental constituent of matter."
fiction: -  "Quarks are elementary particles and a fundamental constituent of light."

truth: -  "There are six types of quarks known as up, down, charm, strange, top, and bottom."
fiction: -  "There are six types of quarks known as left, right, sweet, sour, high, and low."

truth: -  "Neutrinos are one of the fundamental particles which make up the universe. They are also one of the least understood."
fiction: -  "Neutrinos are one of the fundamental particles which make up the universe. They are also the most massive."

truth: -  "Antimatter is a material composed of antiparticles, which have the same mass as particles of ordinary matter but opposite charge."
fiction: -  "Antimatter is a material composed of antiparticles, which have the same mass as particles of ordinary matter but identical charge."

truth: -  "The four fundamental forces of nature are gravity, electromagnetism, the weak nuclear force, and the strong nuclear force."
fiction: -  "The four fundamental forces of nature are gravity, electromagnetism, the weak nuclear force, and the force of love."

truth: -  "Leptons are a group of subatomic particles that do not undergo strong interactions."
fiction: -  "Leptons are a group of subatomic particles that do not undergo any interactions."

truth: -  "The Large Hadron Collider (LHC) is the world's largest and highest-energy particle collider."
fiction: -  "The Large Hadron Collider (LHC) is the world's smallest and lowest-energy particle collider."

truth: -  "The discovery of the Higgs boson at the LHC confirmed the existence of the Higgs field."
fiction: -  "The discovery of the Higgs boson at the LHC disproved the existence of the Higgs field."

truth: -  "Fermions are particles that follow Fermi-Dirac statistics and have half-integer spins."
fiction: -  "Fermions are particles that follow Fermi-Dirac statistics and have full-integer spins."

truth: -  "Bosons are particles that follow Bose-Einstein statistics and have integer spins."
fiction: -  "Bosons are particles that follow Bose-Einstein statistics and have half-integer spins."

truth: -  "The weak nuclear force is responsible for radioactive decay."
fiction: -  "The weak nuclear force is responsible for gravitational pull."

truth: -  "The strong nuclear force holds the nucleus of an atom together."
fiction: -  "The strong nuclear force holds the electrons of an atom together."

truth: -  "Gluons are elementary particles that mediate the strong force between quarks."
fiction: -  "Gluons are elementary particles that mediate the gravitational force between quarks."

truth: -  "The photon is the force carrier for the electromagnetic force."
fiction: -  "The photon is the force carrier for the strong nuclear force."

truth: -  "The W and Z bosons are the force carriers for the weak nuclear force."
fiction: -  "The W and Z bosons are the force carriers for the electromagnetic force."

truth: -  "The graviton is a hypothetical elementary particle that mediates the force of gravity."
fiction: -  "The graviton is a hypothetical elementary particle that mediates the force of electromagnetism."

truth: -  "Quantum Chromodynamics (QCD) is the theory of the strong interaction between quarks and gluons."
fiction: -  "Quantum Chromodynamics (QCD) is the theory of the strong interaction between electrons and photons."

truth: -  "The Standard Model of particle physics describes three of the four known fundamental forces."
fiction: -  "The Standard Model of particle physics describes all known forces, including gravity."

truth: -  "The electron is a subatomic particle with a negative electric charge."
fiction: -  "The electron is a subatomic particle with a positive electric charge."

truth: -  "The proton is a subatomic particle with a positive electric charge."
fiction: -  "The proton is a subatomic particle with a negative electric charge."

truth: -  "The neutron is a subatomic particle with no electric charge."
fiction: -  "The neutron is a subatomic particle with a double electric charge."

truth: -  "The tau is a heavier cousin of the electron, belonging to the family of particles known as leptons."
fiction: -  "The tau is a lighter cousin of the electron, belonging to the family of particles known as quarks."
